cot_history.cot_text: As I've been analyzing the past few nights, I've noticed that player_5 was more vocal and aggressive in their accusations against VILLAGER_3, especially during the discussion phase. Their behavior of suddenly stopping their argument and claiming a sudden change in opinion doesn't sit well with me. Their actions also seemed more calculated, trying to sway opinions to their advantage. Additionally, their silence during the discussion phase seemed suspicious, as they didn't provide any concrete evidence or reasoning to back up their claims. Given these inconsistencies, I believe player_5 may not be telling us the whole truth about their allegiance.

Their aggressive behavior and calculated silence during the discussion phase are telling, and if they were truly loyal to the VILLAGER team, I would expect more concrete evidence to back it up. Instead, they're trying to make us doubt themselves, and I think they're hiding something.
